Label.style: text-align: center; color: white; font-size: 16px; text-shadow: 0px 0px 3px 3.7 #000000FF; text-overflow: shrink; align: center center; font-family: monospaceNumbersFont;z-index:2;

Panel.style: transition-property: opacity; transition-delay: 0.0s; transition-duration: 0.6s; background-color:#060b65; opacity: .0; z-index: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; align: center center;
